pages.title: Horned Huntsman
pages.text: The Horned Huntsman is a member of the $(item)Wild Hunt$(), a powerful entity created by the $(item)Horned God$().$(p)The demon usually fights by shooting arrows and teleporting short distances, but can also summon hostile $(item)Wolves$() with $(item)Resistance$() potion effect to fight for him.$(p)Upon death, it may drop its $(l:constructs/weapons/spear_of_the_huntsman)Spear$(/l)

pages.title: Summoning the Huntsman
pages.text: The demon can be summoned by lighting a Wicked Man or Bloodied Wicked Man on fire, the latter having a greatly increased chance.$(br)The $(l:constructs/misc/horn_of_the_hunt)Horn of the Hunt$(/l) can also be used to summon the Horned Huntsman.
